name: Inevitable Brew - Winter 2023 game jam
description:
Do everything except make coffee, A.K.A the ADHD simulator - A game made for a game jam, Winter 2023

Inevitable brew is a race against the clock. Your goal is to make coffee, but you'll be distracted by other more important things.

See how high you can get your score before you run out of energy, but remember to make your cup of coffee before the end!

--Windows only for now, MacOS as soon as I can

Thank you to captainripley https://captainripley.itch.io/godot-3d-robot-character
